channel.title: Game Rant
channel.description: Game Rant delivers content written by gamers for gamers with an emphasis on news, reviews, unique features, and interviews.

item.title: Gears of War: Reloaded May Be Either Too Early or Too Late
item.dc:creator: Josh Cotts
item.description: Gears of War: Reloaded lands between major milestones that could either make it too early or too late to the party, depending on what comes next.
item.content:encoded: After countless rumors and leaks of a Gears of War remaster or remake, Gears of War: Reloaded has finally shown itself, offering players a chance to experience the original game on modern consoles and PC. Speculation surrounding the remaster initially assumed it would be either a remaster or a remake of the entire Gears of War trilogy, similar to Halo: The Master Chief Collection. However, Gears of War: Reloaded focuses solely on the first game, albeit with enhancements like 4K resolution, 60 FPS in the campaign, up to 120 FPS in multiplayer, and the inclusion of all previously released content.

item.title: The Best Anti-Heroes In The MCU
item.dc:creator: Melody MacReady
item.description: From The Punisher to Yelena Belova, the Marvel Cinematic Universe has introduced many dark anti-heroes that blur the line between good and bad.
item.content:encoded: The Marvel Cinematic Universe is filled with a diverse array of heroes, but not all of them embody the ideals of justice like Steve Rogers and Peter Parker. Some are darker characters known as anti-heroes, who blur the lines of morality and do not fit the typical hero mold. These anti-heroes possess more complex traits, often exhibiting both good and bad qualities simultaneously.

item.title: Sick Samurai - Official Announcement Trailer
item.dc:creator: Game Rant Staff
item.description: Sick Samurai is a fast-paced, brutal action game developed by Solideo. Take a look at the official announcement trailer here.
item.content:encoded: Sick Samurai is a fast-paced, brutal action game developed by Solideo. Take a look at the official announcement trailer here.

item.title: Death Stranding 2 Looks Like the RPG the First Game Flirted With
item.dc:creator: Josh Cotts
item.description: Death Stranding 2's Proficiency system shapes Sam’s growth through gameplay choices, making it far more of an RPG than the first game ever was.
item.content:encoded: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach hands-on previews have officially gone live, which means fans have been treated to a more in-depth look at its world, gameplay, and story. Based on what has now been revealed, Death Stranding 2 is bringing an even greater host of changes to the original game than was originally anticipated, to the point that it feels like it might be a different experience altogether. Whether those changes ultimately work in its favor remains to be seen, but at the very least, these changes suggest Death Stranding could be broadening its audience alongside its horizons in the sequel.

item.title: Genshin Impact 5.7 Leak Shows New Game Mode in Action
item.dc:creator: Hajrudin Krdzic
item.description: A Genshin Impact leak reveals gameplay footage of a new permanent game mode that should arrive in the upcoming update 5.7.
item.content:encoded: A Genshin Impact leak has revealed in-game footage featuring a new game mode that has previously been referred to as the "new Spiral Abyss." This unique Genshin Impact domain is considered the most difficult part of the endgame, as it challenges players to fight through 12 different floors, each harder than the last.

item.title: Botsu - Official Reveal Trailer
item.dc:creator: Game Rant Staff
item.description: Compete in various ragdoll, physics-based battlesports in Peculiar Pixels' Botsu. Watch the official reveal trailer here.
item.content:encoded: Compete in various ragdoll, physics-based battlesports in Peculiar Pixels' Botsu. Watch the official reveal trailer here.

item.title: Stephen King Loved This Zombie Series With a Higher Rating Than The Walking Dead
item.dc:creator: Rachael Fiddis
item.description: One critically acclaimed zombie series with a 97% rating on Rotten Tomatoes won the heart of Stephen King.
item.content:encoded: When it comes to epic zombie shows, The Walking Dead tops the list of many fans' best post-apocalyptic TV series', but it's far from being the only one to set horror lovers' hearts racing, as a fairly unknown French show called Les Revenants (The Returned) has better Rotten Tomatoes ratings than the popular AMC series, and it's a favorite of Stephen King.

item.title: Final Fantasy 10's Cut Content Explained
item.dc:creator: Josh Cotts
item.description: Tidus had a different job, Auron wore a different face, and a familiar sword lay buried, hinting at the stranger shape Final Fantasy 10 nearly took.
item.content:encoded: No video game, not even Final Fantasy 10, can make it through development without experiencing some substantial cuts. Many of these cuts are often made due to budgetary or time constraints, visionary changes, or shifts in the development team, all of which happen frequently as a game is being conceived. While Final Fantasy 10 is widely considered one of the better Final Fantasy games ever made, it is ultimately the result of an original vision that was cut to pieces and reorganized before its release.

item.title: Best Open-World Games For First-Person Combat
item.dc:creator: Tristan Jurkovich
item.description: Open-world game enthusiasts looking for satisfying first-person combat should look no further than the following games.
item.content:encoded: There's nothing better than coming out of a video game drought to get immersed in a new open-world game, especially during the cold winter months or the hot summer months when many are out of school. Open-world games run the gamut on how big they are, their themes, and especially their combat types, even if things are just narrowed down to open-world games that are in first-person.

item.title: The First Descendant Reveals Season 3 Update and NieR: Automata Collab
item.dc:creator: Jo Craig
item.description: During a panel at PAX East 2025, The First Descendant producer Beomjun Lee announces the looter shooter’s Season 3 update and NieR: Automata collab.
item.content:encoded: The First Descendant has announced its brand-new Season 3 update in tandem with a NieR: Automata collaboration reveal. The details were given at PAX East 2025, known as a collection of gaming culture festivals held annually in Seattle, Boston, Philadelphia, and Melbourne, during a panel with The First Descendant producer Beomjun Lee.
